buzz: ^Buzz off kid. I'm trying to get rid of these damn slimes
thanks: ^Thank you so much. I've been trying to get those things off my property for weeks.
^Now what can I do for you?
^Interesting outfit. Do you work for SkyCorp?

c-0: ^Regretably, I did work for SkyCorp, but those assholes fired me for being a free thinker.
^So now I'm stuck in this isolated house with a lifetime supply of their shitty uniforms
^You sound like you want revenge. Will you help me get back at them?
^You need to let that hurt go my guy.
^I'd love more than to stick it to them. What do you have in mind?
^I'm breaking into their base to steal some fuel. You worked there?
^Hell yeah! I can sync up with your transmitter and guide you through that place. I know exactly where to find what you need.
^Anything to put Simeon Sky in his place.

c-1: ^Oh I don't need this from you. Buzz off!

help: ^I'll be ready for you when you enter that base.
